FUNCTION quickmask, input_image, thresh ;+ ; :Description: ; Finds center of mask where pixels are above a given threshold ; ; :Params: ; input_image : in, required, type=byte ; 2D array of pixels to mask with threshold ; thresh : in, required, type=float ; Threshold used to select pixels ;- s = SIZE(input_image,/dimensions) n_col = s[0] n_row = s[1] suncheck = input_image gt thresh xpos = TOTAL( TOTAL(suncheck, 2) * INDGEN(n_col) ) / TOTAL(suncheck) ypos = TOTAL( TOTAL(suncheck, 1) * INDGEN(n_row) ) / TOTAL(suncheck) RETURN, {xpos:xpos,ypos:ypos} END
